column2: This is a full release of the DA1458x/DA1468x Production Line Tool (PLT) v4.3.

column3: Option to burn OTP image and header as a single binary.
Warning pop-up window when any OTP write is enabled.
DA1468x DK power profiler as current measurement instrument.
DA1458x configurable SPI and EEPROM memories.
DA1458x sleep clock selection (needed for boost mode).
Scan advertisements using the production test firmware.
Added PER limits in RF RSSI tests.
Remove all DA1468x QSPI dependencies from production test firmware.
DA1468x uartboot QSPI initialization only when required. Uartboot and plt_fw now operate even with no QSPI mounted.
Added DUT IC name in DUT logs.
Fix DA1468x configurable UART boot pins.
